title: Web Programming Languages
content:
Hi Typophiles,

Since there’s so many intelligent people on this board I figured someone could point me to a decent resource on an overview of the major web development programming languages that are used today, and situations you might need each one.

Does a resource like this exist? Book, webpage, whatever.

Thanks to everyone in advance.

Adam
author: lazyeye88

comments.content: Well, your’s website is pretty standardized. Hell, it’s not even using transitional markup. So I guess you should go to pyton.org , java.com , or php.net (though php technically are not programming). webdeveloperplus.com, dev-tips.com, and devsnippets.com also a great place to visit for mid~advance coders.
